column5: I asked in announce and hoping that maybe it's just being missed there. This is a fairly critical situation with someone homeless and living in a motel. Hoping someone can help! THANKS!  Have a good friend looking for a furnished, if possible, 2 bedroom apartment, or house, in the Bradford area. Needed immediately!  If anyone has a lead.. please PM me.  THANKS!

has he tried a local realtor ...they are actually helpful with this type of thing as well  ...just an idea.... TB4me is from that area and is in construction....he might have a lead on something as well...  Good Luck to your friend Cheers....
Thanks.. got a guy with a lot of personal pride... I'm just sticking a hand out on his behalf hoping someone can help.
So far I have only found 1 bedroom ones and non furnished  I'll keep searching tho.
bump cause I know what's going on.  someone out there must know someone!

Going to be difficult to find a 2 bedroom furnished... but here is what I have seen... mostly un-furnished... however furnature can be had cheap @ value village etc...  http://barrie.en.craigslist.ca/apa/2807465699.html <---- seems decent.. http://toronto.en.craigslist.ca/yrk/apa/2804272421.html <---furnished 1 bedroom  http://barrie.kijiji.ca/c-real-estate-apartments-condos-2-bedroom-Bradford-2-bed-with-laundry-balcony-parking-W0QQAdIdZ347014630 http://barrie.kijiji.ca/c-real-estate-apartments-condos-2-bedroom-Bradford-2-bedroom-apt-W0QQAdIdZ343439472 http://barrie.kijiji.ca/c-real-estate-apartments-condos-2-bedroom-BRIGHT-2-BRM-WALKOUT-BSMT-APARTMENT-W0QQAdIdZ341646406 http://toronto.kijiji.ca/c-real-estate-apartments-condos-1-bedroom-BRADFORD-LARGE-1-BR-WALKOUT-BASEMENT-APT-W0QQAdIdZ347044535  http://toronto.kijiji.ca/c-real-estate-apartments-condos-1-bedroom-Loretto-Country-Trailer-for-Rent-W0QQAdIdZ325040497  G
Only found a one room furnished, immediate  http://www.gottarent.com/apartment/vacancy/spaceid/32551/unitid/55795
Tell me about it.   Lots of places in the Barrie area. Needs to just decide.
This one is more down my area (Richmond Hill) but seems nice    Furnished Apt.
Hes from brantford, not bradford. Awesome guy to fish with as well.
thanks Vin...where the heck is Bradford? ( if you answer this question tomorrow...this thread will get another run through the ranks and i wont have to Map Quest it)
I am thinking he meant TB4me is from brantford  and Irish is looking in Bradford
